text: Janani is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Rajeevnath, starring Siddique in the lead role.http://www.indiaglitz.com/channels/malayalam/review/12037.html ==Cast== * Kavi Ladnier as Sister Mary Ann * Siddique as Father * Latheef as Doctor * Bobby Kottarakkara as Kuttichan (Servant) * Poojappura Radhakrishnan as Petty shop Owner( Cameo) * Roslin as Sr. Victoria * Thrissur Elsy as Sr. Glory * Valsala Menon as Sr. Gorothy * Cherthala Lalitha as Sr. Metilda * Rugminiyamma as Sr. Theresa * Sreedevi Teacheras Sr. * Santhakumari as Servant Eliyamma * Priyanka as Palamoottil Janet * Manju Mathew * Mavelikkara Ramachandran as Father * Master Anirudh as Baby aka Victor Sebastian ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films Category:Films whose director won the Best Director National Film Award
title: Janani (1999 film)
